title: Cozy and fully remodeled 2-bedroom apartment in the Brookview Gardens.
posting_body: Second floor garden condominium in small, quiet (21 unit) Dracut complex, close to the Lowell line.
A quiet little out of the way place, yet convenient to everything.
This Upper Level unit has been recently remodeled and now features amazing recessed lighting, classic hardwood flooring thru-out, and antique white kitchen cabinetry.
80% of units are owner occupied, property manager on premises.
Laundry facilities in the building (1st floor)
Fee Includes: Water, Sewer, trash removal, Master Insurance, Laundry Facilities, Exterior Maintenance, Snow Removal.
*Gas and electric bill (combined) range ~$50-$120 per month
Dr. Christos Daoulas Education Complex: 0.8 miles (Dracut High School/Jr. High School/Englesby Middle School/Brookside Elementary)
